description:
Factorio is a game about automation. You play as an engineer who has crash landed on the planet
Nauvis, an inhospitable world filled with dangerous creatures called biters. Build a factory,
research new technologies, and become more efficient in your quest to build a rocket and return home.

factorio_saws-0.0.7r2.description: Mods should now be correctly downloadable from the webhost
factorio_saws-0.0.7r2.title: Factorio Space Age Without Space 0.7

factorio_saws-0.5.description: Quick bugfix to allow "no-enemies mode" in worldgen settings.
factorio_saws-0.5.title: Factorio Space Age Without Space 0.5

factorio_saws-0.6.description:
* Updated base Factorio to latest main (We finally have access to Atomic Cliff Remover Traps, among other things)
* Fixed bug where the client would use the wrong host.yaml block
* Fixed Generation while in a multiworld with a game using GER
factorio_saws-0.6.title: Factorio Space Age Without Space 0.6

factorio_saws-0.8.0.description:
* Updated SAWS Client to use an isolated config folder.  This allows you to use the same Factorio executable for both server and client.
  * Saves and Mods go in the `factorio_saws` folder in your archipelago folder.  
  * This is a port of my PR for vanilla Factorio at https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/4221, hopefully it merges there in time for AP 0.6.4 🙂
factorio_saws-0.8.0.title: Factorio - Space Age Without Space v0.8.0

factorio_saws-0.8.1.description:
## 0.8.1
* Prevented webhost from serving an incorrectly renamed mod file.


## 0.8.0
* Updated SAWS Client to use an isolated config folder.  This allows you to use the same Factorio executable for both server and client.
  * Saves and Mods now go in the `factorio_saws` folder in your archipelago folder.  
  * This is a port of my PR for vanilla Factorio at https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/4221, hopefully it merges there in time for AP 0.6.4 🙂

factorio_saws-0.8.2.description:
## 0.8.2
* Added a `configure_server` script to the SAWS folder to help easily set up mod settings for the server.


## 0.8.1
* Prevented webhost from serving an incorrectly renamed mod file.


## 0.8.0
* Updated SAWS Client to use an isolated config folder.  This allows you to use the same Factorio executable for both server and client.
  * Saves and Mods now go in the `factorio_saws` folder in your archipelago folder.
  * This is a port of my PR for vanilla Factorio at https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/4221, hopefully it merges there in time for AP 0.6.4

## 0.8.3
* Fixed compatibility with SpaceAgeWithoutSpace 0.0.17


## 0.8.2
* Added a `configure_server` script to the SAWS folder to help easily set up mod settings for the server.


## 0.8.1
* Prevented webhost from serving an incorrectly renamed mod file.


## 0.8.0
* Updated SAWS Client to use an isolated config folder.  This allows you to use the same Factorio executable for both server and client.
  * Saves and Mods now go in the `factorio_saws` folder in your archipelago folder.
  * This is a port of my PR for vanilla Factorio at https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/4221, hopefully it merges there in time for AP 0.6.4 🙂
factorio_saws-0.8.3.title: Factorio - Space Age Without Space v0.8.3

factorio_saws-0.8.4.description:
## 0.8.4
* Fixed crash when the satellite recipe had a byproduct of hot fluoroketone.
* Adjusted apconfig.ini to account for weird linux installs where `__PATH__system-read-data__` is not valid.

## 0.8.3
* Fixed compatibility with SpaceAgeWithoutSpace 0.0.17

## 0.8.2
* Added a `configure_server` script to the SAWS folder to help easily set up mod settings for the server.

## 0.8.1
* Prevented webhost from serving an incorrectly renamed mod file.

## 0.8.0
* Updated SAWS Client to use an isolated config folder.  This allows you to use the same Factorio executable for both server and client.
  * Saves and Mods now go in the `factorio_saws` folder in your archipelago folder.
  * This is a port of my PR for vanilla Factorio at https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/4221, hopefully it merges there in time for AP 0.6.4 🙂
factorio_saws-0.8.4.title: Factorio - Space Age Without Space v0.8.4

factorio_saws-0.8.5.description:
## 0.8.5
* Fixed rare divide by zero error when calculating ingredient costs.

## 0.8.4
* Fixed crash when the satellite recipe had a byproduct of hot fluoroketone.
* Adjusted apconfig.ini to account for weird linux installs where __PATH__system-read-data__ is not valid.

## 0.8.3
* Fixed compatibility with SpaceAgeWithoutSpace 0.0.17


## 0.8.2
* Added a `configure_server` script to the SAWS folder to help easily set up mod settings for the server.


## 0.8.1
* Prevented webhost from serving an incorrectly renamed mod file.


## 0.8.0
* Updated SAWS Client to use an isolated config folder.  This allows you to use the same Factorio executable for both server and client.
  * Saves and Mods now go in the `factorio_saws` folder in your archipelago folder.
  * This is a port of my PR for vanilla Factorio at https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/4221, hopefully it merges there in time for AP 0.6.4 🙂
factorio_saws-0.8.5.title: Factorio - Space Age Without Space v0.8.5
